kjv_def: attend (give self) continually (upon), continue (in, instant in, with), wait on (continually)
strongs_def: to be earnest towards, i.e. (to a thing) to persevere, be constantly diligent, or (in a place) to attend assiduously all the exercises, or (to a person) to adhere closely to (as a servitor)
outline:
1. to adhere to one, be his adherent, to be devoted or constant to one
  2. to be steadfastly attentive unto, to give unremitting care to a thing
  3. to continue all the time in a place
  4. to persevere and not to faint
  5. to show one's self courageous for
  6. to be in constant readiness for one, wait on constantly
